data.name: Capsa - Character Novelty Patterns Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Capsa - Character Novelty Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your characters clothes.

This pack of cosmetic items contains clothing patterns for both male and female characters, supporting hoodies, t-shirts and long-sleeve t-shirts.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Character Element Patterns
  • Character Kitten Patterns
  • Character Alien Patterns
  • Character Kangaroo Pattern
  • Character Stop Staring At My Chest Pattern
  • Character European Union Pattern
  • Character Paw Pattern
  • Character Maple Leaf Pattern
  • Character Atomic Pattern
  • Character Panda Pattern
  • Character See You In Valhalla Pattern
  • Character Evolution Pattern
  • Character You Look Really Funny Doing That With Your Head Pattern
  • Character French Kiss Pattern
  • Character Heart Pattern
  • Character Delicious Pi Pattern
  • Character Top 10 Reasons Why I Am Lazy Pattern
  • Character This Is How I Roll Pattern
  • Character Shamrock Pattern
  • Character Pothead Pattern
  • Character Kitten Pattern
  • Character Don't Be An Ass Pattern
  • Character I Wonder If Tacos Think About Me Too... Pattern
  • Character I Heart NZ Pattern
  • Character I'm A Special Snowflake Pattern
  • Character I'd Rather Be Watching Cats On The Internet Pattern
  • Character Anarchy Pattern
  • Character Star Pattern
  • Character I'm Into Fitness Pattern
  • Character Peace Pattern
  • Character In My Defense I Was Left Unsupervised Pattern
  • Character Lifeguard Pattern
  • Character Tacocat Pattern
  • Character Hump Day Pattern
  • Character Keep Calm And Carry On Pattern
  • Character Irony The Opposite Of Wrinkly Pattern
  • Character I Believe Pattern
  • Character Error 404 Pattern
  • Character Never Forget Pattern
  • Character Do Not Read The Next Sentence Pattern
  • Character Punctuation Saves Lives Pattern
  • Character Please Do Not Spoon The Bacon Pattern
  • Character FE Man Pattern
  • Character Smiley Face Pattern
  • Character Tuxedo Pattern

data.short_description: The Capsa - Character Novelty Pattern Pack includes a selection of patterns to enable you to begin customizing your clothes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon™ RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
